LLToast.message: This profile requires the BotBase Lisbeth to run.
Please make sure Lisbeth is installed correctly before proceeding.

If.Condition: &Gigantshark; == 1 and not HasAtLeast(7686,1) and ExBuddy.Helpers.SkywatcherPlugin.IsWeatherInZone(134, 'Clear Skies', 'Fair Skies')
&Meteor_Survivor; == 1 and not HasAtLeast(7903,1) and IsTimeBetween(2,4) and ExBuddy.Helpers.SkywatcherPlugin.IsWeatherInZone(135, 'Clouds', 'Fog', 'Wind')
&The_Greatest_Bream_in_the_World; == 1 and not HasAtLeast(7909,1) and IsTimeBetween(19,22) and SkywatcherPlugin.IsWeatherInZone(137, 'Clear Skies', 'Fair Skies')
&Shark_Tuna; == 1 and not HasAtLeast(7915,1) and IsTimeBetween(18,20) and ExBuddy.Helpers.SkywatcherPlugin.IsWeatherInZone(137, 'Clear Skies', 'Fair Skies')
&Bombardfish; == 1 and not HasAtLeast(7924,1) and IsTimeBetween(8,14) and ExBuddy.Helpers.SkywatcherPlugin.IsWeatherInZone(137, 'Clear Skies')

&The_Old_Man_in_the_Sea; == 1 and not HasAtLeast(8753,1) and ExBuddy.Helpers.SkywatcherPlugin.IsWeatherInZone(137, 'Clear Skies') and ExBuddy.Helpers.SkywatcherPlugin.PredictWeatherInZone(137, TimeSpan.FromHours(-4), 'Rain', 'Showers')
&The_Salter; == 1 and not HasAtLeast(7925,1) and IsTimeBetween(16,19) and ExBuddy.Helpers.SkywatcherPlugin.IsWeatherInZone(137, 'Clear Skies', 'Fair Skies')
&The_Drowned_Sniper; == 1 and not HasAtLeast(7938,1) and ExBuddy.Helpers.SkywatcherPlugin.IsWeatherInZone(137, 'Clear Skies', 'Fair Skies')
&Mirrorscale; == 1 and not HasAtLeast(7940,1) and IsTimeBetween(8,15) and ExBuddy.Helpers.SkywatcherPlugin.IsWeatherInZone(137, 'Clear Skies', 'Fair Skies')
&Navigators_Brand; == 1 and not HasAtLeast(7693,1) and IsTimeBetween(8,13) and ExBuddy.Helpers.SkywatcherPlugin.IsWeatherInZone(138, 'Clear Skies', 'Fair Skies')
&Helmsmans_Hand; == 1 and not HasAtLeast(7941,1) and IsTimeBetween(8,14) and ExBuddy.Helpers.SkywatcherPlugin.IsWeatherInZone(138, 'Clouds', 'Fog', 'Wind')
&Frilled_Shark; == 1 and not HasAtLeast(7950,1) and IsTimeBetween(16,2) and ExBuddy.Helpers.SkywatcherPlugin.IsWeatherInZone(138, 'Clouds', 'Fog', 'Wind')
&Coelacanthus; == 1 and not HasAtLeast(8755,1) and IsTimeBetween(21,2) and ExBuddy.Helpers.SkywatcherPlugin.IsWeatherInZone(138, 'Clouds', 'Fog', 'Wind')

&Endoceras; == 1 and not HasAtLeast(8756,1) and IsTimeBetween(19,3) and ExBuddy.Helpers.SkywatcherPlugin.IsWeatherInZone(138, 'Clouds', 'Fog', 'Wind') and ExBuddy.Helpers.SkywatcherPlugin.PredictWeatherInZone(138, TimeSpan.FromHours(-8), 'Clear Skies', 'Fair Skies')

&Seahag; == 1 and not HasAtLeast(8757,1) and IsTimeBetween(18,1) and ExBuddy.Helpers.SkywatcherPlugin.IsWeatherInZone(138, 'Clear Skies', 'Fair Skies') and ExBuddy.Helpers.SkywatcherPlugin.PredictWeatherInZone(138, TimeSpan.FromHours(-8), 'Clear Skies', 'Fair Skies')
&Toramafish; == 1 and not HasAtLeast(7905,1) and IsTimeBetween(16,19) and ExBuddy.Helpers.SkywatcherPlugin.IsWeatherInZone(139, 'Fog', 'Clouds')
&Thundergut; == 1 and not HasAtLeast(7937,1) and IsTimeBetween(18,2) and ExBuddy.Helpers.SkywatcherPlugin.IsWeatherInZone(180, 'Rain')
&Twitchbeard; == 1 and not HasAtLeast(7917,1) and IsTimeBetween(3,5) and ExBuddy.Helpers.SkywatcherPlugin.IsWeatherInZone(339, 'Clear Skies', 'Fair Skies')
&Stormdancer; == 1 and not HasAtLeast(7713,1) and IsTimeBetween(17,2) and ExBuddy.Helpers.SkywatcherPlugin.IsWeatherInZone(132, 'Rain', 'Snow')
&Carp_Diem; == 1 and not HasAtLeast(7701,1) and IsTimeBetween(9,14) and ExBuddy.Helpers.SkywatcherPlugin.IsWeatherInZone(133, 'Clouds', 'Fog')
&Ghost_Carp; == 1 and not HasAtLeast(7700,1) and IsTimeBetween(21,3) and ExBuddy.Helpers.SkywatcherPlugin.IsWeatherInZone(148, 'Rain')

&Magicked_Mushroom; == 1 and not HasAtLeast(8773,1) and ExBuddy.Helpers.SkywatcherPlugin.IsWeatherInZone(152, 'Clouds', 'Fog') and ExBuddy.Helpers.SkywatcherPlugin.PredictWeatherInZone(152, TimeSpan.FromHours(-8), 'Rain', 'Thunder')
&Floating_Boulder; == 1 and not HasAtLeast(7913,1) and IsTimeBetween(0,8) and ExBuddy.Helpers.SkywatcherPlugin.IsWeatherInZone(153, 'Clouds', 'Fog')
&The_Sinker; == 1 and not HasAtLeast(7921,1) and IsTimeBetween(21,3) and ExBuddy.Helpers.SkywatcherPlugin.IsWeatherInZone(153, 'Clear Skies', 'Fair Skies')
&Shadowstreak; == 1 and not HasAtLeast(7947,1) and IsTimeBetween(4,10) and ExBuddy.Helpers.SkywatcherPlugin.IsWeatherInZone(154, 'Fog')
&Sweetnewt; == 1 and not HasAtLeast(7923,1) and IsTimeBetween(23,4) and ExBuddy.Helpers.SkywatcherPlugin.IsWeatherInZone(340, 'Fog')
&Glimmerscale; == 1 and not HasAtLeast(7714,1) and ExBuddy.Helpers.SkywatcherPlugin.IsWeatherInZone(140, 'Clear Skies', 'Fair Skies')
&Ndendecki; == 1 and not HasAtLeast(8765,1) and IsTimeBetween(18,5) and ExBuddy.Helpers.SkywatcherPlugin.IsWeatherInZone(140, 'Fog')

&Bat_o_Nine_Tails; == 1 and not HasAtLeast(8766,1) and ExBuddy.Helpers.SkywatcherPlugin.IsWeatherInZone(140, 'Clear Skies', 'Fair Skies', 'Clouds', 'Fog') and ExBuddy.Helpers.SkywatcherPlugin.PredictWeatherInZone(140, TimeSpan.FromHours(-8), 'Rain')
&Marrow_Sucker; == 1 and not HasAtLeast(7704,1) and IsTimeBetween(20,3) and ExBuddy.Helpers.SkywatcherPlugin.IsWeatherInZone(145, 'Rain', 'Showers')
&Mud_Pilgrim; == 1 and not HasAtLeast(7702,1) and (IsTimeBetween(0,7) or IsTimeBetween(17,24)) and ExBuddy.Helpers.SkywatcherPlugin.IsWeatherInZone(145, 'Rain', 'Showers')
&The_Wardens_Wand; == 1 and not HasAtLeast(7918,1) and IsTimeBetween(17,20) and ExBuddy.Helpers.SkywatcherPlugin.IsWeatherInZone(145, 'Clear Skies')
&Discobolus; == 1 and not HasAtLeast(7928,1) and IsTimeBetween(12,18) and ExBuddy.Helpers.SkywatcherPlugin.IsWeatherInZone(146, 'Heat Waves')
&Magic_Carpet; == 1 and not HasAtLeast(7931,1) and IsTimeBetween(9,16) and ExBuddy.Helpers.SkywatcherPlugin.IsWeatherInZone(146, 'Heat Waves')

&Helicoprion; == 1 and not HasAtLeast(8768,1) and IsTimeBetween(8,20) and ExBuddy.Helpers.SkywatcherPlugin.IsWeatherInZone(146, 'Heat Waves') and ExBuddy.Helpers.SkywatcherPlugin.PredictWeatherInZone(146, TimeSpan.FromHours(-8), 'Clouds', 'Fog')
&Hannibal; == 1 and not HasAtLeast(7943,1) and IsTimeBetween(22,4) and ExBuddy.Helpers.SkywatcherPlugin.IsWeatherInZone(147, 'Fog')

&Wootz_Knifefish_Zenith; == 1 and not HasAtLeast(8767,1) and IsTimeBetween(1,4) and ExBuddy.Helpers.SkywatcherPlugin.IsWeatherInZone(147, 'Fog') and ExBuddy.Helpers.SkywatcherPlugin.PredictWeatherInZone(147, TimeSpan.FromHours(-8), 'Clear Skies', 'Fair Skies')
&Spearnose; == 1 and not HasAtLeast(7919,1) and IsTimeBetween(21,24) and ExBuddy.Helpers.SkywatcherPlugin.IsWeatherInZone(341, 'Clouds', 'Fog')
&Starbright; == 1 and not HasAtLeast(7945,1) and IsTimeBetween(20,3) and ExBuddy.Helpers.SkywatcherPlugin.IsWeatherInZone(155, 'Clear Skies', 'Fair Skies')
&Dawn_Maiden; == 1 and not HasAtLeast(7944,1) and IsTimeBetween(4,6) and ExBuddy.Helpers.SkywatcherPlugin.IsWeatherInZone(155, 'Clear Skies', 'Fair Skies')
&Darkstar; == 1 and not HasAtLeast(8769,1) and IsTimeBetween(18,3) and ExBuddy.Helpers.SkywatcherPlugin.IsWeatherInZone(155, 'Snow', 'Blizzards')

&Blue_Corpse; == 1 and not HasAtLeast(8770,1) and ExBuddy.Helpers.SkywatcherPlugin.IsWeatherInZone(155, 'Clear Skies', 'Fair Skies') and ExBuddy.Helpers.SkywatcherPlugin.PredictWeatherInZone(155, TimeSpan.FromHours(-8), 'Snow', 'Blizzards')
&Anomalocaris; == 1 and not HasAtLeast(7949,1) and IsTimeBetween(9,14) and ExBuddy.Helpers.SkywatcherPlugin.IsWeatherInZone(155, 'Clear Skies', 'Fair Skies')

&Shonisaurus; == 1 and not HasAtLeast(8772,1) and ExBuddy.Helpers.SkywatcherPlugin.IsWeatherInZone(155, 'Blizzards') and ExBuddy.Helpers.SkywatcherPlugin.PredictWeatherInZone(155, TimeSpan.FromHours(-8), 'Clear Skies', 'Fair Skies')

&Shonisaurus; == 1 and not HasAtLeast(8772,1) and ExBuddy.Helpers.SkywatcherPlugin.IsWeatherInZone(155, 'Blizzards') and ExBuddy.Helpers.SkywatcherPlugin.PredictWeatherInZone(155, TimeSpan.FromHours(-8), 'Clear Skies', 'Fair Skies')

&Hailfinder; == 1 and not HasAtLeast(16745,1) and ExBuddy.Helpers.SkywatcherPlugin.IsWeatherInZone(397, 'Blizzards') and ExBuddy.Helpers.SkywatcherPlugin.PredictWeatherInZone(397, TimeSpan.FromHours(-8), 'Snow', 'Blizzards')
&Flarefish; == 1 and not HasAtLeast(16746,1) and IsTimeBetween(9,15) and ExBuddy.Helpers.SkywatcherPlugin.IsWeatherInZone(397, 'Blizzards')
&Bishopfish; == 1 and not HasAtLeast(17577,1) and IsTimeBetween(9,13) and ExBuddy.Helpers.SkywatcherPlugin.IsWeatherInZone(397, 'Clear Skies')
&Charibenet; == 1 and not HasAtLeast(17592,1) and IsTimeBetween(23,2) and ExBuddy.Helpers.SkywatcherPlugin.IsWeatherInZone(397, 'Blizzards')

&Captain_Nemo; == 1 and not HasAtLeast(17578,1) and ExBuddy.Helpers.SkywatcherPlugin.IsWeatherInZone(397, 'Blizzards') and ExBuddy.Helpers.SkywatcherPlugin.PredictWeatherInZone(397, TimeSpan.FromHours(-8), 'Snow')

&Merciless; == 1 and not HasAtLeast(16756,1) and ExBuddy.Helpers.SkywatcherPlugin.IsWeatherInZone(397, 'Blizzards') and ExBuddy.Helpers.SkywatcherPlugin.PredictWeatherInZone(397, TimeSpan.FromHours(-8), 'Snow', 'Blizzards')
&Aetherlouse; == 1 and not HasAtLeast(7951,1) and IsTimeBetween(2,12) and ExBuddy.Helpers.SkywatcherPlugin.IsWeatherInZone(156, 'Gloom')

&Ignus_Horn; == 1 and not HasAtLeast(8758,1) and ExBuddy.Helpers.SkywatcherPlugin.IsWeatherInZone(156, 'Clear Skies', 'Fair Skies') and ExBuddy.Helpers.SkywatcherPlugin.PredictWeatherInZone(156, TimeSpan.FromHours(-8), 'Gloom')

&Blood_Red_Bonytongue; == 1 and not HasAtLeast(8776,1) and IsTimeBetween(3,11) and ExBuddy.Helpers.SkywatcherPlugin.IsWeatherInZone(156, 'Fog') and ExBuddy.Helpers.SkywatcherPlugin.PredictWeatherInZone(156, TimeSpan.FromHours(-8), 'Clear Skies', 'Fair Skies')

&Void_Bass; == 1 and not HasAtLeast(8759,1) and ExBuddy.Helpers.SkywatcherPlugin.IsWeatherInZone(156, 'Gloom') and ExBuddy.Helpers.SkywatcherPlugin.PredictWeatherInZone(156, TimeSpan.FromHours(-8), 'Clear Skies', 'Fair Skies')
&Ninja_Betta; == 1 and not HasAtLeast(8761,1) and IsTimeBetween(17,8) and ExBuddy.Helpers.SkywatcherPlugin.IsWeatherInZone(156, 'Gloom')
&Canavan; == 1 and not HasAtLeast(8763,1) and IsTimeBetween(7,17) and ExBuddy.Helpers.SkywatcherPlugin.IsWeatherInZone(156, 'Gloom')
&Kuno_the_Killer; == 1 and not HasAtLeast(8763,1) and IsTimeBetween(7,17) and ExBuddy.Helpers.SkywatcherPlugin.IsWeatherInZone(156, 'Gloom')
(&Fat_Purse; == 1 or &Bishopfish; == 1 or &The_Impaler; == 1 or &Captain_Nemo; == 1 or &La_Reale; == 1) and not HasAtLeast(12711,50)

(&Crystal_Perch; == 1 or &Mirrorscale; == 1 or &Worm_of_Nym; == 1 or &Ghost_Carp; == 1 or &The_Assassin; == 1 or &Sylphsbane; == 1 or &Vip_Viper; == 1 or &Glimmerscale; == 1 or &Mud_Pilgrim; == 1 or &Old_Hollow_Eyes; == 1) and not HasAtLeast(2594,50)
(&Son_of_Levin; == 1 or &Spearnose; == 1 or &Blue_Corpse; == 1 or &Merciless; == 1) and not HasAtLeast(2607,50)
(&Great_Gudgeon; == 1 or &Bloody_Brewer; == 1 or &Dream_Goby; == 1 or &Slime_King; == 1) and not HasAtLeast(2588,50)
(&Giant_Takitaro; == 1 or &Cornelia; == 1 or &Discobolus; == 1 or &Charons_Lantern; == 1 or &Aetherlouse; == 1 or &Ignus_Horn; == 1 or &Void_Bass; == 1) and not HasAtLeast(2603,50)

(&The_Salter; == 1 or &The_Terpsichorean; == 1 or &Imperial_Goldfish; == 1 or &The_Green_Jester; == 1 or &Bloodbath; == 1 or &The_Gobfather; == 1 or &Ndendecki; == 1 or &Bat_o_Nine_Tails; == 1 or &The_Wardens_Wand; == 1 or &Wootz_Knifefish_Zenith; == 1 or &The_Matriarch; == 1 or &Blood_Red_Bonytongue; == 1 or &Canavan; == 1 or &Kuno_the_Killer; == 1) and not HasAtLeast(2599,50)
(&Little_Perykos; == 1 or &Junkmonger; == 1 or &Frilled_Shark; == 1 or &Seahag; == 1 or &Pirates_Bane; == 1) and not HasAtLeast(2585,50)
(&Moldva; == 1 or &Sweetnewt; == 1 or &Mud_Golem; == 1 or &Ninja_Betta; == 1) and not HasAtLeast(2592,50)
(&Beguiler_Chub; == 1 or &Caterwauler; == 1 or &Chirurgeon; == 1 or &Dark_Ambusher; == 1) and not HasAtLeast(2586,50)
(&Nepto_Dragon; == 1 or &Armorer; == 1 or &Fingers; == 1 or &Dirty_Herry; == 1) and not HasAtLeast(2606,50)
(&Goldenfin; == 1 or &Octomammoth; == 1 or &The_Old_Man_in_the_Sea; == 1 or &Helmsmans_Hand; == 1) and not HasAtLeast(2587,50)
(&Syldra; == 1 or &Shark_Tuna; == 1 or &Coelacanthus; == 1 or &Endoceras; == 1 or &Twitchbeard; == 1) and not HasAtLeast(2596,50)
(&Syldra; == 1 or &Shark_Tuna; == 1 or &Coelacanthus; == 1 or &Endoceras; == 1 or &Twitchbeard; == 1) and not HasAtLeast(2597,50)
(&Faerie_Queen; == 1 or &Toramafish; == 1 or &King_of_the_Spring; == 1 or &Magicked_Mushroom; == 1 or &Hannibal; == 1) and not HasAtLeast(2626,3)
